room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: I loved my game master Dylan!! Super fun and super entertaining! Clean establishment and friendly staff

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: We've done 3 of the rooms here and each are awesome! The clues make you think, but aren't so difficult that you're left bored and frustrated. We shared many laughs and felt very accomplished to break out. Perfect group date night experience!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: This was my family's and myself first time. At times it's difficult to find entertaining activities for older teenagers going into adulthood.This by far was worth it! The unlimited clues were extremely helpful, the staff was amazing!!! I so look forward to going again.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: We did the Mystery Mansion for my daughter's 13th birthday with 6 of her friends. They had a great time.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: We booked an escape room for my daughters birthday party on a Saturday afternoon. Our host was Devin (sp?) and he was great! The room we had was the mystery mansion. It was very challenging but you could ask for hints at any time. I recommend this place to people of all ages. We had a great time and will definitely return. Would be great for a date or just to kill an hour at the mall. Well done!
